it.polimi.se2018.controller.states

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardSelectionState, ConnectionState, GameplayState

    public interface State
    States are used to handle player's connections and disconnections: connection and disconnections are handled differently according to the fact that a game is already started or not. See the ConnectionState and GameplayState comments.
    Author:
    Pietro Ghiglio
